title: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran’s supreme leader, is dead at 86
summary_full: He played a behind-the-scenes role in Iran’s Islamic revolution, served as president in the 1980s and dominated the country for more than three decades.
summary_public: He played a behind-the-scenes role in Iran’s Islamic revolution, served as president in the 1980s and dominated the country for more than three decades.

IR.label: neutral
IR.evidence: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran’s supreme leader, is dead
